comments.body: It looks like we don't have testcases which are run with `-target jvm-9` currently, that would be very useful to validate that the changes in this PR indeed work correclty on Java 9 (since these tests can't be run on Java 8, they'll need to be excluded by default and only enabled in the CI when we run Java 11)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@    case "jvm-1.7"     => asm.Opcodes.V1_7
    case "jvm-1.8"     => asm.Opcodes.V1_8
    case "jvm-9"       => asm.Opcodes.V9
  }
